modName: StandAlone Wife Maisie black face bug fix
summary: Here is a quick temporary black face fix for the stand-alone wife Maisie.
descriptionHtml:
I love the stand-alone wife Maisie but in the last edit she caught the black face bug.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52137/?]StandAlone Wife Maisie[/url]

After some research I found the fix and applied it.

This is only a temp fix for her! I will remove it as soon as asked or notified that the main mod is fixed.

Installation:
Manually copy the Data folder over or use NMM...

See my other mods:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61941/?]All DLC Sorting Solution[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54138/?]Better Starting Equipment
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61946/?]Patch for An NPO Module Crossbows[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54147/?]Standalone Maisie black face fix
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54334/?]Working Trick Shot Archery Perk[/url]
author: FilipePiro

files.name: Maisie Face Fix
files.changelogHtml: I missed a file in the original fix.
